description:
Know what to do in a medical emergency?
This Home First Aid Course app describes important first aid techniques in an easy to understand way.

Topics covered:

   1. Bleeding
   2. Shock
   3. Heart Attack
   4. Burn
   5. Chocking
   6. Stroke
   7. Head and Spine Injury
   8. Cuts and scraps
   9. Amputation
  10. Seizure and Convulsions
  11. Childbirth
  12. Frostnip and Frostbite
  13. Cramps Exhaustion
  14. Insect Bites and Stings

Disclaimer: This application is only for information purpose. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
